name: azure-iot-sim
description: Simulated devices on azure iot hub

scripts.register device: az iot hub device-identity create --hub-name YourIoTHubName --device-id MyNodeDevice
scripts.show device connection: az iot hub device-identity show-connection-string --hub-name YourIoTHubName --device-id MyNodeDevice --output table
scripts.show service connection: az iot hub device-identity show-connection-string --hub-name YourIoTHubName --device-id MyNodeDevice --output table

author: Andrew Moss <andrew@m0ss.dev> (https://m0ss.dev/)
